Package org.group8.controller

Class HealthcenterController

java.lang.Object
org.group8.controller.HealthcenterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerForP, IControllerForV
public class HealthcenterController extends Object implements IControllerForP, IControllerForV
The HealthcenterController class is for managing the health center simulation.
